post:
DaringHost.com - We Dare To Be Different

 

Daring Host was founded in April of 2010, and has not looked back since. We have been here day in and day out for over the past 4 years, without breaks. We take pride in helping our clients grow and becoming successful. We are not afraid to go the extra mile if it means our clients will have a better chance at successfully running their website or business. 

 

Daring Host understands that the internet world never shuts down or closes. It runs constantly: 24x7, 365 days of the year without interruptions. We understand that your website needs to be reached by the world every second of the day. It's a fact that downtime results in lost traffic and revenue. This is why Daring Host's goal is to provide you with the most stable and reliable VPS service you've ever experienced.

 


Why pick Daring Host over the others?

 


  • Experience - We have been in business since 2010. We know what works, how it works, and why it works. Don't let your website or business fail due to incompetent hosting providers.


  • Scalibility - Each plan we offer is scalable. You can upgrade your configuration at anytime without any downtime or IP address changes. It's really that easy! 


  • Customization - Do our pre-made plans not match your requirements? No problem. We offer fully customizable plans to exactly meet your requirements. 


  • Reliability - We believe that no corners should be cut in our business. We use top of the line enterprise grade Supermicro servers on a rock solid network. 


  • Support - Tired of waiting hours for support to reply to your ticket? That won't be a problem at DaringHost. Our average support ticket reply is only 15 minutes! (Click here to see all of our average reply times).  

 

 

 

--------------------------------------------------

All VPS Plans Include:

 


  • Instant Setup After Payment


  • SolusVM Control Panel


  • Rock Solid Network (100% Network Uptime Guarantee!)


  • Protection Against Dos and DDos attacks


  • 1Gbps Network Port


  • Reliable and Competent Support Staff


  • Live Chat For Pre-Sale and Support


  • Add Full VPS Management For Only $15/month

 

--------------------------------------------------

 

 

--------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------

DDos Protection

 

Each VPS comes with 4Gbps or 4Mpps Dos/DDos protection. The protection is located right in Chicago and is NOT back hauled through LA or any other location. This means you will not notice an increase in latency. 

 

--------------------------------------------------

 

Node Setup + Benchmarks

 

Supermicro Hotswap Chassis + Motherboard

Intel E3-1230 V2

32GB Ram

4 x 2TB Western Digital RE4 Hard Drives

Hardware RAID 10

Free VPS Migration

 

Want to switch from another host to DaringHost? No worries! We offer free VPS transfers with every plan. We will move and restore your VPS on our servers at no extra cost. Just open a support ticket after you place an order.

 

 

Datacenter + Network:

 

Our VPS nodes are located in Steadfast's 725 S Wells Facility (Chicago, Illinois) 

 

Our VPS nodes are connected to a rock solid fully redundant BGP4 network (AS32748 - Steadfast Networks) consisting of multiple Tier 1 bandwidth providers. 

 

Test IP Address: 208.100.4.54   

 

*Please note that we are not apart of the Steadfast corporation. Our servers are just located in their datacenter*
